identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
identity.vibe: Zen Productivity. Swiss Precision meets Organic Warmth.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tight tracking (tracking-tight) for sizes > 32px. No uppercase unless overline label.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, inputs, and UI text. High legibility.

accents.usage: Use ONLY for AI summaries/messages to give them a 'written' human feel. Italicize key phrases.

primary.description: Deep Emerald/Forest Green. Represents Growth and Stability.

secondary.description: Warm Amber/Ochre. Use for 'Action Required' or 'High Priority'.

visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on the main background to reduce digital sterility.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #E7E5E4. No heavy borders. Use 'divide-y' for lists.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-3 bg-stone-100 text-stone-900 hover:bg-stone-200

cards.style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-stone-200/60 shadow-sm overflow-hidden

kanban.column: bg-stone-50/50 rounded-2xl p-4 min-w-[300px] border border-transparent
kanban.card: bg-white p-4 rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-stone-100 hover:shadow-md cursor-grab active:cursor-grabbing mb-3

inputs.style: bg-white border-stone-200 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all shadow-sm placeholder:text-stone-400

workspace_hero.usage: Use as background for the Onboarding/Login page with a dark overlay.

user_avatar.usage: Default user avatar in the top right dashboard.

empty_state_zen.usage: Use when Job Inbox is empty or All Tasks Complete.

general: Follow the 'Zen Productivity' theme. Do not make it look like a spreadsheet.
Use ample whitespace. Don't crowd the dashboard.
Prioritize the 'Today' view. It should look like a curated agenda.
Animations: Use 'framer-motion' for staggered entrance of list items and smooth page transitions.
Icons: Use 'lucide-react' with stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

dashboard_layout.sidebar: Fixed width (240px). Minimal navigation. Logo at top.
dashboard_layout.main: Scrollable area. Max-width constraint (max-w-6xl) to prevent eye fatigue on wide screens.

feature_specifics.kanban_board: Horizontal scroll container. Columns: Saved, To Apply, Applied, Interview, Offer, Rejected. Make columns collapsible if possible.
feature_specifics.job_card: Minimalist. Company Logo (placeholder circle if none), Job Title (Bold), Location (Text-sm muted), Days ago tag.
feature_specifics.ai_assistant: Panel that slides in from the right. Use the 'Libre Baskerville' font for the AI's voice to differentiate it from UI text.

tech_stack_rules.tailwind: Use arbitrary values only if necessary. Stick to the design tokens defined above.
tech_stack_rules.shadcn: Customize the default radius and focus rings to match the 'Organic Swiss' theme.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container (.App { text-align: center; }).
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters (ðŸ¤–, etc.) for icons. Use Lucide icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, entrance animations.
